meanings.definition: A group of four isomeric alcohols derived from butane, with the general formula C4H10O.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the properties of butanols in the laboratory.
meanings.sent2: The factory uses butanols in the production of cleaning products.
meanings.sent3: The butanols in the test tube decided to have a party and mix with other chemicals.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like butanols, branching out in different directions.
meanings.sent5: The smell of butanols lingered in the air, reminding him of his chemistry class.

meanings.definition: A type of chemical compound used in various industrial applications.
meanings.sent1: The company purchased a large quantity of butanols for their manufacturing process.
meanings.sent2: Workers in the plant wear protective gear when handling butanols.
meanings.sent3: The butanols in the storage tank whispered to each other about their next adventure.
meanings.sent4: The impact of his words on her was like the effect of butanols on metal.
meanings.sent5: The bright blue color of the butanols container stood out among the other chemicals.
